description:
Kan’s grandpa, Kanichi, is back in Japan for a family vacation, and King Genie and Akubi couldn’t be more surprised. The Kanichi they knew fifty years ago has changed completely, prompting tears of joy from King Genie and unexpected changes in Kan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ganso Kan-chan ga Kaette Kita! no Hanashi
元祖カンちゃんが帰ってきた! の話
